reviewText: I really like the stuff this company produces.  It is about The Sacredness of Sex!  It is a stroke-by-stroke demonstration about how to massage your Beloved.
I watched it once and that was it as the picture quality was not good at all, will not recommend it to anyone.

I found this item very useful for a first time participant int he art of massage. It opens up the viewers own imagination and possibilities. This video will put you and your partner on the path to a much closer and intimate relationship. The terminology use was very basic and easy to follow.

My boyfriend and I watched this DVD together in the bedroom and followed along.  It was easy and quite arousing.  It starts with tips on setting a sexy atmosphere, then moves into how to relax the whole body, and finally experimenting with different touches and techniques.  It led to some mind-blowing sex for us... I highly recommend!
